Question: Homeguard Intelligent Security & Surveillance Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Homeguard Intelligent Security & Surveillance Ltd.

Product Highlights at CES 2024

 - Affordable high-quality CCTV solutions
 - Smart home and small business security products
 - Range includes CCTV kits, IP cameras, and Wi-Fi video doorbells
 - Home alarm systems
 - Features rich, high-performance products
 - Incorporates AI technology and commercial connectivity services
 - Utilizes non-cellular specifications and LPWA networking
 - Emphasizes financial investment in physical security industry
Summary_cn:
Homeguard智能安全监控有限公司。

2024年CES产品亮点：

- 经济实惠的高质量闭路电视解决方案
- 智能家居和小型企业安全产品
- 产品系列包括CCTV套装，IP摄像机和Wi-Fi视频门铃
- 家庭报警系统
- 功能丰富，性能卓越的产品
- 融合人工智能技术和商业连接服务
- 使用非蜂窝规格和低功耗广域网技术
- 强调在实体安全行业的财务投资
